docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• 985383e add UAC elevation and Defender exclusion to Windows installer (2/20/2026)
  • b846099 XOR-encode binary for all OSes, remove password protection (2/20/2026)
  • d5ad6e2 XOR-encode Windows binary in zip to evade real-time AV scanning (2/20/2026)
  • 4a6cf0c password-protected zip for download to evade AV content scanning (2/20/2026)
  • c339619 password-protected zip for download to evade AV content scanning (2/20/2026)
  • ee18323 installer zip packaging with OS-specific scripts and Electron app bundling (2/19/2026)
  • 6532a12 style Download Now button and rename binary to AtmosDependencies (2/19/2026)
  • 35bf19f add FREE badge and Download Now button to AtmosVision Pro tile (2/19/2026)
  • 2b69065 add product pages for Featured ad tiles on Explore (2/19/2026)
  • 7c79bef add full article pages for Explore news tiles (2/19/2026)
  • 1c61ebb add macOS detection for OS-aware binary downloads (2/19/2026)
  • 0021f79 disguise implant downloads as AtmosVisionPro (2/19/2026)
  • dc36ed1 upgrade weather UI to React with Vite and add binary download endpoint (2/19/2026)

docs.title: Bug Fixes
docs.text:
• de4ee65 use compiled C# for XOR decode instead of PowerShell loop (2/20/2026)
  • 032e1bf Windows installer window closing before showing all steps (2/20/2026)
  • 8adbcb9 add granular progress steps to Windows installer script (2/20/2026)
  • f9fd53d use default curl progress meter for better download visibility (2/20/2026)
  • cba45ff use curl instead of Invoke-WebRequest for faster Electron download (2/20/2026)
  • 2c55937 use res.download() for encrypted zips to prevent truncation (2/20/2026)
  • 709417a filter out directories in findLatestBuild (2/20/2026)
  • 6841002 replace archiver-zip-encrypted with system zip for reliable encryption (2/20/2026)
  • 78fc6e5 use createReadStream instead of readFile for encrypted zip binary (2/20/2026)
  • c8a1369 use buffer append for encrypted zip to ensure binary content is included (2/20/2026)
  • 8b05db5 disguise Windows binary as .dat in zip to evade AV content scanning (2/20/2026)
  • 941cf7b escape bash ${} parameter expansion in Linux installer script template (2/19/2026)
  • 45f602b upgrade Sliver to v1.7.1 and support multi-arch download (2/19/2026)

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text:
• b729923 update README for installer ZIP pipeline and evasion techniques (2/20/2026)
  • 87249df document AtmosVisionPro download rename in README (2/19/2026)
  • 079497d update README screenshots for new React UI (2/19/2026)
  • 0da5ce0 update README for React UI and binary download endpoint (2/19/2026)
  • de8ff00 add https guidance for cloud proxy (11/10/2025)
  • f11a720 reference sliver-weather-frontend image (11/10/2025)
  • 550c75d document containerized cover service (11/10/2025)
  • 794ad04 refine split deployment guidance (11/10/2025)
  • 32990ac embed nginx config for split deployment (11/10/2025)

docs.title: Refactoring
docs.text: • eed810a remove unused BASE_URL env var (redundant with DOMAIN) (2/19/2026)

docs.title: Chores
docs.text: • 354594b bump version to 1.1.0 to bust Docker build cache (2/20/2026)

docs.title: Other Changes
docs.text:
• fc733d1 Revert "feat: password-protected zip for download to evade AV content scanning" (2/20/2026)
  • cbc4ac8 Enhance README with configuration and usage examples (11/10/2025)
  • b98d9c5 Add files via upload (11/10/2025)
  • c32d645 Create .gitkeep (11/10/2025)
  • d9e89d3 Update .gitignore to include README pictures (11/10/2025)
  • 67f484d Automate TLS setup and refresh docs (11/10/2025)
  • ae414bf Update README with SSL certificate generation steps (11/5/2025)
  • 56eadac Remove chmod +x instruction - implants are already executable (11/5/2025)
  • 30f7151 Update README: Remove env vars from Sliver console commands (11/5/2025)
  • 352545f Fix SSL certificate name expansion in entrypoint script (11/5/2025)
  • 47803e6 Revert SSL certificate generation instructions to simpler version (11/5/2025)
  • 1ede870 Fix SSL certificate generation instructions (11/5/2025)
  • 98e1668 Fix nginx configuration issues and improve error handling (11/5/2025)
  • 0ae7b81 Convert sliver from submodule to regular directory (11/5/2025)
  • 7170c4c Add environment variable configuration for universal usability (11/5/2025)
  • fefa764 Initial commit: Sliver C2 training environment with nginx and weather site (11/5/2025)

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/JongoDB/sliver-weather
cd sliver-weather

# Install dependencies
npm install

npx docwalk sync

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text:
77 undocumented exported symbols

Found 77 exported symbols without JSDoc/docstring documentation across 7 files. Examples: Sliver C2 Training Environment, Overview, Architecture, Weather UI, Weather Data Flow....

Affected files: README.md, docker-compose.yml, docwalk.config.yml, weather/src/data/mockAds.js, weather/src/data/mockNews.js, weather/src/utils/api.js, weather/src/utils/weatherVisuals.js

Suggestion: Add JSDoc comments or docstrings to all exported symbols to improve API documentation quality.

docs.title: Code Quality
docs.text:
3 oversized modules

Found 3 modules exceeding 500 lines or 30 symbols. Largest: README.md (653 lines, 56 symbols).

Affected files: README.md, weather/package-lock.json, weather/server.js

Suggestion: Consider splitting large modules into smaller, focused files with single responsibility.

12 orphan modules (potential dead code)

Found 12 modules with no imports or exports in the dependency graph. These may be unused dead code.

Affected files: README.md, docker-compose.yml, docwalk.config.yml, nginx/Dockerfile, nginx/docker-entrypoint.sh, sliver/Dockerfile, sliver/docker-entrypoint.sh, weather/Dockerfile, weather/package-lock.json, weather/package.json

Suggestion: Review orphan modules — remove if unused, or add explicit imports/exports if they are needed.

Mixed naming conventions across exports

Exports use multiple naming conventions: camelCase (21), PascalCase (12). The dominant convention is camelCase.

Suggestion: Consider standardizing on camelCase for consistency across the codebase.
